verbs.description: The former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani [V: is] joining the legal team representing President Donald Trump in the Russia investigation .
[ARG0: The former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani] is [V: joining] [ARG1: the legal team representing President Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in the Russia investigation] .
